Question: Does a government agency maintain a publicly available registry of rights and license details (i.e. a cadastre)?
ZERO (A):
Yes, the registry contains at least the following information:
- Name of license holder 
- Coordinates 
- Date/year of application and award 
- Duration 
- Type of license 
- Names of companies that hold an interest in the block
ONE (B):
Yes, the registry contains at least the following information:
- Name of license holder 
- Coordinates 
- Date/year of application and award 
- Type of license
TWO (C):
Yes, the registry contains at least the following information:
- Name of license holder 
- Coordinates
